header.title: Meet Me On Nostr
header.tagline: an app for sharing Nostr with friends.

LoginCard.messagemvp: Login to generate a 'Follow Me' QR code for your friends.
LoginCard.message: Login to generate custom Nostr invitation QR codes for your freinds to sign up and follow you, start a DM thread with you, and discover your reccomended Nostr favs.

AwardsPromoCard.details: COMMING SOON!! Every month top Nostr advcates will win!
